attributes.action: hold a referendum on adopting the Euro as the UK's currency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the 1997 Election was won by Mr. Blair, he promised a referendum on adopting the Euro as the currency here in the UK.  Now he is gone and we did not have this referendum - so surely Mr. Brown should take on this responsibility and hold such a vote.  Everyone should be able to have their say - whether they are pro- or anti-Euro.
